item.title: 莱恩称，工资增长放缓，欧洲央行将把通胀率维持在 2
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，由于非能源价格趋缓，欧洲中央银行应能将通胀率保持在目标水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to keep inflation at target thanks to a moderation in non-energy prices, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 据称 Aegon 将探索剥离资产以加强对美国市场的关注
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Aegon Ltd. 正在探索出售其在美国以外的部分业务，以专注于其最大的市场。【原文：Aegon Ltd. is exploring selling some of its operations outside of the US as it looks to focus on its largest market, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 伦敦一度活跃的股市为何陷入困境？
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所失去了魔力。随着公司选择在其他地方上市、将现有上市地转移到美国以及接受私有化交易，这家拥有 300 多年历史的交易所正在萎缩。【原文：The London Stock Exchange has lost its mojo. The more than 300-year-old bourse is shrinking as companies opt to go public elsewhere, shift their existing listings to the US, and accept deals to be taken private.】

item.title: 财政预算案刺激债券反弹，Vanguard 和皇家伦敦买入英国国债
item.description: 由于英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的预算案在很大程度上赢得了市场的青睐，先锋集团（Vanguard Group Inc.【原文：Vanguard Group Inc. and Royal London Asset Management Ltd. bought gilts on Wednesday as UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget largely won favor with markets, sparking the biggest rally in longer-dated bonds since April.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司 Permira 有意收购德国旅游公司
item.description: 据私人信贷机构 Permira Credit 称，该公司正在就收购德国旅游运营商 Berge & Meer 进行深入谈判，这是直接贷款机构通过入股支持债务人这一日益增长的趋势的又一迹象。【原文：Private credit lender Permira Credit is in advanced talks to take over German tour operator Berge & Meer, according to the company, another sign of the growing trend of direct lenders moving to take equity positions to support their debtors.】

item.title: Altice International 的次级债权人与杰富瑞、米尔班克合作
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Altice International Sarl 的一些无担保债权人在与该公司进行债务谈判之前，已聘请 Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Some of Altice International Sarl’s unsecured creditors have hired Jefferies Financial Group Inc. and Milbank LLP as advisers ahead of debt talks with the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国隐形税率将使 500 多万人进入税率超过 40% 的阶层
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）延长了冻结收入起征点的政策，到下一个十年开始时，约有 540 万工人将被推入 40% 至 45% 的高税率阶层。【原文：Some 5.4 million workers will have been pushed into higher tax brackets of between 40% and 45% by the start of the next decade after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves extended a policy of freezing income thresholds.】

item.title: 随着天然气成本攀升，美国人支付的电费也创下历史新高
item.description: 根据美国能源信息署的数据，在电价创下近两年来最大涨幅之后，美国家庭支付的电费比以往任何时候都要高。【原文：American households are paying more than ever before for electricity after prices surged the most in almost two years, according to the US Energy Information Administration.】

item.title: 申请失业救济人数意外下降，国债反弹受阻
item.description: 由于新公布的美国劳动力市场数据强于预期，国债连续四天的反弹在周三陷入停滞，10 年期国债收益率重回 4% 以上。【原文：A four-day rally in Treasuries stalled on Wednesday, sending the 10-year yield back above 4% as fresh US labor market data came in stronger than expected.】

item.title: 华尔街乐观情绪推动 J&J 向 5000 亿美元市值迈进
item.description: 强生公司的股票市场估值濒临 5000 亿美元，因为投资者提高了对该公司应对其主要牛皮癣药物销售额下降的策略能否奏效的赌注。【原文：Johnson & Johnson’s stock market valuation is flirting with $500 billion as investors raise their bets that firm’s strategy to cope with eroding sales for its major psoriasis drug will pan out.】

item.title: 里夫斯在 260 亿英镑预算受挫后仍对增税敞开大门
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在宣布了一项260亿英镑（约合344亿美元）的增收方案以稳定英国的公共财政后，并未排除在本届议会中进一步增税的可能性。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves didn’t rule out further tax increases in this parliament, after announcing a £26 billion ($34.4 billion) revenue-raising package to stabilize Britain’s public finances.】

item.title: 美国 Altice 公司质疑用于阻挠 LME 的债权人协议
item.description: 在过去的两年里，一些重组和金融律师在晚宴、客户会议和会议舞台上告诉任何愿意倾听的人，债权人通过所谓的合作协议联合起来，规避了反垄断法。【原文：For the past two years, some restructuring and finance lawyers have been telling anyone who would listen — at dinners, client meetings and on conference stages — that creditors were skirting antitrust laws by banding together in so-called cooperation agreements.】

item.title: 科里说：人工智能消费狂潮重现页岩气早期的 "大干快上 "时代
item.description: 凯雷集团的杰夫-库里（Jeff Currie）说，大科技公司在人工智能上令人瞠目的投入，就像页岩气价格暴跌前的黄金时代，2.6 万亿美元的股本化为乌有。【原文：The eye-popping amounts Big Tech is shelling out on artificial intelligence resembles shale’s golden age of spending before a price crash wiped out $2.6 trillion in equity, Carlyle Group Inc.’s Jeff Currie says.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉移民逃离智利引发骚乱
item.description: 涓涓细流般的委内瑞拉人从智利进入秘鲁，引发了一场政治骚乱和边境镇压；这一迹象表明，当局担心这是拉丁美洲这个反移民最严重的国家涌出移民潮的开始。【原文：The trickle of Venezuelans crossing into Peru from Chile is triggering a political furor and a border crackdown — a sign that authorities fear it’s the start of a flood out of Latin America’s most anti-immigrant country.】

item.title: 印度期待更多墨西哥贸易，希望避开辛巴关税
item.description: 印度驻墨西哥最高外交官表示，印度希望促进与墨西哥在软件、医药和 IT 方面的贸易，同时也希望墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆能免除其对一系列亚洲商品提出的出口关税。【原文：India wants to boost trade with Mexico in software, pharmaceuticals and IT, its top Mexican diplomat said, while also hoping President Claudia Sheinbaum will exempt its exports from tariffs she’s proposed on a range of Asian goods.】

item.title: 英国打击最大零售商以减轻陷入困境的商店的税收负担
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）对大型零售商的仓库和最大的商店征收更高的税款，因为她试图兑现为陷入困境的小商店创造公平竞争环境的承诺。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves hit large retailers with higher taxes on their warehouses and biggest stores, as she tries to deliver on a promise to level the playing field for struggling smaller shops.】

item.title: 盎格鲁-泰克交易获得咨询公司 ISS 的支持
item.description: 机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services Inc.）建议投资者下月投票支持英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）与泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）的合并，这是第二家支持这项矿业交易的股东咨询公司。【原文：Institutional Shareholder Services Inc. recommends investors vote in favor of Anglo American Plc’s combination with Teck Resources Ltd. next month, the second shareholder advisory firm to support the mining deal.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 标志着账户所在的位置
item.description: X 的新措施提高了用户来源的透明度。【原文：New measures at X increase transparency about where users come from.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率小幅下降，30 年期贷款利率降至 6.23
item.description: 抵押贷款利率在连续三周上调后有所下降，使潜在购房者在一定程度上缓解了价格压力。【原文：Mortgage rates fell after three weeks of increases, giving prospective buyers some relief from price pressures.】

item.title: 韩国火箭发射标志着商业太空竞赛的转变
item.description: 韩国首次发射由私营公司主导的火箭，这是韩国争取在全球太空竞赛中发挥更大作用的一个里程碑。【原文：South Korea marked its first rocket launch led by a private company, a milestone in the country’s bid to become a bigger player in the global space race.】

item.title: 波兰将利用欧盟国防新拨款加强无人机能力
item.description: 波兰是欧盟军事资助计划的最大受益国，它正打算将一大笔贷款用于增强其无人机能力和防御能力，以应对俄罗斯的空中入侵。【原文：Poland, the biggest beneficiary of the European Union’s military funding program, is aiming to spend a big chunk of the loans to build up its drone capabilities and defenses in the face of aerial incursions by Russia.】

item.title: Blackstone 即将以 40 亿美元收购 MacLean Power Systems
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 接近收购 MacLean Power Systems，该交易对这家公用事业零部件制造商的估值可能超过 40 亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing an acquisition of MacLean Power Systems in a deal that could value the utility-parts maker at more than $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fortress 将以 4.65 亿美元的债券交易出售加勒比酒店
item.description: 堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）计划出售美属维尔京群岛圣托马斯岛的两处度假村，交易资金将来自市政债券，最终将由维尔京群岛收购。【原文：Fortress Investment Group plans to sell two resorts on St. Thomas in the US Virgin Islands through a deal that will be financed by municipal bonds, and which will allow the territory to ultimately acquire the property.】

item.title: 牛肉市场对每个人来说都是破碎的
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 石油交易商对乌克兰协议持谨慎态度，认为供应转移速度缓慢
item.description: 石油交易商和分析师并不急于押注乌克兰和平计划会立即给俄罗斯向全球供应石油带来巨大变化。【原文：Oil traders and analysts aren’t racing to bet on a Ukraine peace plan bringing big immediate changes to Russia’s supply of petroleum to the world.】

item.title: 摩根大通私人银行看好 S&P 500 指数到 2027 年上涨 20
item.description: 美国股市在过去四天里反弹了 4%，这让发出全面调整即将来临警告的熊市平息了下来；现在，股市多头又开始趾高气扬了。【原文：The 4% rally in US stocks over the past four days has quieted bears warning a full blown correction was in the offing — and now equity bulls are strutting again.】

item.title: 伦敦三个议会遭受网络攻击，服务中断
item.description: 伦敦三个议会受到网络攻击的影响，服务中断，被迫启动应急计划。【原文：Three councils in London have been affected by a cyberattack that’s disrupted their services and forced them to activate emergency plans.】

item.title: 尽管亿万富豪纷纷出走，但英国预计将有更多非家庭纳税人受益
item.description: 尽管越来越多的超级富豪迁往其他地区，但英国政府仍期望通过对富裕居民优惠税收制度的重大改革获得更大的意外之财。【原文：The UK government is expecting a bigger windfall from major reforms to a preferential tax system for wealthy residents, despite a growing number of ultra-rich individuals relocating to other territories.】

item.title: 据称力拓将寻求出售在美国的一些重要矿产资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，力拓集团正在寻求剥离其在美国生产硼的资产，硼是一种重要的矿物质，可用于从化肥到玻璃制造等各种用途。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is seeking to divest its US assets that produce boron, a critical mineral used in various applications ranging from fertilizers to glass making, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: S&P 将 Tether Stablecoin 稳定性评级降至 "弱 "级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司将Tether的USDT稳定币维持与美元挂钩的能力下调至最低评级，并警告说，比特币价值的下跌可能会导致稳定币抵押不足。【原文：The ability of Tether’s USDT stablecoin to maintain its peg to the US dollar has been downgraded to the lowest rating by S&P Global Ratings, which warned that a drop in Bitcoin’s value could leave the stablecoin undercollateralized.】
